original_title: En Camino - Messico, Machismo e Nuvole
overview: En Camino is a journey from Mexico City to MÃ©rida. It collects the testimonies of many women and activists. Through their experiences and emotions, we face a fundamental question: what does it mean to be a woman in Mexico?
title: En Camino - Messico, Machismo e Nuvole
